name: 3 minutes to ignition
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Introduction
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Try to escape from the zombies, but the car engine won't start, so you have to endure for 3 minutes.

Created by GodotEngine for GAMEOFF2022.

The project repository is

https://github.com/sanitygames/gameoff2022/settings

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mouse: Attacks on Zombies, Button Click

Keyboard: Shout

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
